H0.text: In which country is the city of Maastricht. Belgium

H1.text: In which country is the city of Maastricht. Germany

H2.text: In which country is the city of Maastricht. France

H3.text: In which country is the city of Maastricht. Olanda

A4.text: Maastricht is a city and a municipality in the southeastern Netherlands.

A5.text: Maastricht is the capital and largest city of the province of Limburg.
